Who: RODIMUS PRIME, CYCLONUS, SCOURGE, JHIAXUS, SCORPONOK, Tuscon,
Nightshift, Darkhawk, Perceptor
Location: Black Fortress - Tunnels beneath the Black Fortress

> "Dont cross in my way, Rodimus"while he tried to hold his emotions that for
> first time in centuries overhelmed him "I dont want to have to destroy
> you... You and Nightlight were the only friends that I had..."he sighed"The
> kid was right, I'm aging"

Rodimus nodded, sadness mixed with resigned resolution crossing his
face. He orients his weapon again, trying to find a shot that wouldn't
kill him but would look good when the sound of falling earth could be
heard echoing from down the tunnel, and the distinct sound of drilling
erupted into the hall for a moment and then grinds to a stop.

Rodimus turned his weapon to face this new threat as Cyclonus and
Jhiaxus step from the hole in the wall, one obviously made by
Skorponok who was still in Scorpion mode. Scourge stepped out as well,
and like the others his weapons drawn.

"Well Well" Jhiaxus said as he stepped clearly into the tunnel, "It
would seem we have found Perceptor after all Cyclonus." Jhiaxus said,
his face was cold as he spoke, yet with a hint of some dark humor,
"Consorting with the enemy are we?" his voice was confident, almost
smug. "That is most unfortunate."

Unknown to most, while Jhiaxus was talking, Cyclonus was transmitting
this to Hydras, making sure he heard it all.

"GO!" Rodimus said fiercly to Tuscon and Perceptor, "Its too late for
anything else now. "I will hold them so you can get away! Get
Nightlight and Windlord out of here! This is my mess, and I will
finish it! GO!"

Rodimus turned to face the slowly advancing Decepticons.

(TAG)

(OOC: I have a few plans for Rodimus, but feel free to stay or go as
you folks see fit)

Preston
